raw_comment:
I noticed:
- each color represented the month
- the leaves grow quickly on the east and not as fast on the west

I wondered
- why did the the leaves grow slower in the west
-why may took longer 

Catchy title name Growth of the leaves
ace_sentences: I noticed that each color represented a month.
I noticed that the leaves grew quickly in the east.
I noticed that the leaves did not grow as fast in the west.
I wondered why the leaves grew more slowly in the west.
I wondered why the growth of the leaves in the west took longer.
The title is: Growth of the leaves.
